name: A jeweled dagger known as 'Annihilator' (1h)
data: It has ILLEGAL weapon class for its type (adequate in general).
It increases the users strength pitifully.
It increases the users dexterity a bit.
It gives tiny bonus to the skill 'triple backstab'.
It gives tiny bonus to the skill 'anatomy'.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives tiny bonus to the skill 'triple thrust'.
